column5: Friday and Saturday before the big storm the St. Larry smallies have been on fire. Over 70 smallies were caught between 3 and 4.5lbs. We also were fooling around with the camera,and I think we got some really cool shots. Hope you enjoy.
Nice shots, and really nice fish!
Huge smallies,no straight arm shots there.  Well done.
Some real beauts there Larry !!  Nice twist on the pictures too.
You have those footballs dialed in... Your arms must feel like they're gunna fall off...

Really cool shots. I like the use of the extension on the very first pic. Looks awesome. It kind of looks like you're using the GoPro because of the wide angle lens but the quality is really good. Better than what you'd get with the GoPro so I kind of doubt that's the camera.  Were you pre-fishing for the Renegade Classic by any chance? That water looks mighty familiar and I saw a bunch of bass guys out yesterday.
Thanks guys,its just another thing to do to keep fish interesting. JIGS....no I don,t fish Renegade,but the St. Larry around Mtl. is very similiar to franny.
